Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: The teachers we meet in university have very little time to understand our level of knowledge, but AI is quite easier to feed in what I already know and ask a drop-down of what I need to know now. Lately, AI has become a better teacher than a real teacher.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Then again, some teachers are better than the rest of them.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI seems more personal than the feedback we get from teachers since they don't know us.
